quizzes.title: The crowd were carried ___________ by his passionate speech.
We started ____________ an opera theater company that toured all over the South.
They set _____________ to discover a cure for cancer.
Could you put me ___________ to customer services, please?
Half of Martha's class has gone________________ flu.
The success of this project relies __________ everyone making an effort.
He looks __________ every new words on the morning newspaper.
That top looks great on you it really brings __________ your eyes.
He greeted us warmly and asked ___________ our families.
As your doctor, I urge you to cut ___________ fatty foods if you don't want to have heart trouble.
I came ___________ while the meeting was in progress, so I waited in the back.
The building looked as though it was falling __________, because of the strange angles of the walls.
I try to get a word in, but he always just goes ____________ blathering away.
Would you please pick _______ that book from off the floor?
You'll need to take ____________ a few more plates so we'll have enough for all our guests.
She sat down and took a few deep breaths to calm herself ___________.
We look __________ the neighbors' cat while they're away.
I went _______________ cycling to work at the beginning of the summer, and I haven't been healthier!
Mary couldn't get ___________ the people standing in the hallway.
Come ____________, Helen, you can tell me. I won't tell anyone.
I'm so sorry that you had to go _____________ such a traumatic experience.
When I wake _________ every morning, the greatest joy is gazing upon beautiful landscapes and sunshine, that is the future I desire.
I try not to let my problems at work carry ___________ into my private life.
So many young people set ____________ to change the world.
We were so impressed that we set _________ a second interview for him.
I'll come to the party a little later. I just need to polish ___________ this essay first.
Make a wish and blow __________ your birthday candles!
It took weeks, but my nasty cough has finally gone ___________.
The organization has no income and no reserves to fall back _________.
The earth's resources are being used ____________ at an alarming rate.
He bought me dinner to make _____________ being so late the day before.
My mother started working weekends, so I have to stay home and take care ________ my siblings.
When he finally asked her ____________, she readily accepted, and very soon they were dating on a regular basis.
She never completely got ___________ the loss of her first child.
After months of planning, the launch came ___________ thrillingly.
The drug is still being tested and will not go __________ commercial production for at least two years.
Americans believe that the 50 states make ____________ a union that is greater than the sum of its parts.
She wondered “Who will bring __________ my children if something happens to me?”
My parents took my video games ____________ for getting an F on my last test.
If the kids aren't hungry, it's probably because your mother filled them __________ with junk food.
I have run ___________ of patients with him, he still has not completed the task that I gave him.
Just because he doesn't ask __________ or want your help, doesn't mean he doesn't need it.
Volunteers will come around and hand __________ pamphlets before the lecture.
That song brings ____________ such fond memories of my childhood.
His wife must have been a saint to put ________________ him for all those years.
Please turn the water ____________ when you're done brushing your teeth.
When we went to Boston, we only had a couple of hours to look ____________.
What time do we set ___________ tomorrow?
It's the kind of book you can just dip ___________ into.
I didn't think we would get __________ the last week of exams.
Take these chairs _____________ – we don’t need them.
After the power went_____________ , I spent the night reading by candlelight.
It took me months to save ___________ enough money to go travelling.
There is always something to be cut __________ young trees if they are to grow well.
When he goes on holiday, it takes him the first couple of days just to wind __________.
My landlord's given me a week to clear ___________ of my flat.
It might help you to understand Julia if you think ______________ when you were her age.
I don't expect a lot of people to turn ________ at this event because it's on a Tuesday night.
Now that Thanksgiving has come and gone, it's time to dust ____________ the Christmas decorations!
The designer laid ___________ the book with pictures on every page.
It snowed so much that the event couldn't go ___________ as planned, unfortunately.
Don't be bullied, learn to stand _____________ yourself and what you believe in.
He threw __________ the wrapper after he finished eating the candy bar.
The government has been offering subsidies to put ___________ the price of grain for farmers, millers, and bakers.
John has passed away last week. He died ________ lung cancer.
He was such a skinny kid that I'm glad to see he's finally filled _________ some.
Would you hurry __________ already? I'd like to get to the concert before it's over.
You shouldn't let this great opportunity go __________ just because you're mad at your sister.
Tom showed ___________ at my door with flowers to apologize for his rude remarks.
I've lost a lot of weight over the winter, and I'm looking forward to showing my new body __________ at the beach this summer.
It's an interesting idea and I thought he put it ___________ well.
Here, I noted __________ some ideas for you.
She's been getting __________ yoga recently - she does three classes a week.
The well-dressed businessman looked down _________ the kid wearing a T-shirt in the elevator, not knowing that he was the new CEO.
I have to go hand __________ my term paper now.
He takes ___________ his mother's side of the family.
I came __________ him in the library after work, and we got into a great conversation about Hemingway.
We must keep pace __________ the new development of modern scientific research.
The supermarket chain has promised to cut ___________ on packaging.
I need to stop staying __________ so late—I can barely function at work!
There is nothing I care ___________ more than my children.
Oh, we're going ___________ our weekend plans—I refuse to let a little rain stop us!
Be sure to put __________ your campfire before you go to sleep.
Her name keeps cropping ___________ in conversation.
This sofa turns ______________ a bed, so there is a place for you to sleep tonight if you need to stay over.
Fill ___________ the blank with the correct answer.
The book is made _____________ several different articles.
We can get ________ with four computers at the moment, but we'll need a couple more when the new staff arrive.
I put _____________ weight when I went away to college.
The fire resulted ___________ damage to their property.
He managed to squeeze __________ the crowd at last.
She easily adapts to new environment. Clearly, she quickly settled ___________ in her new house.
Everyone in the class looked __________ the teacher.
Give me a call when you get ____________ the bus.
She didn't come to the party because her car broke _________ on the way here.
I had to take $10,000 ____________ of a savings account in order to pay for the car.
I've taken _____________ a new project at work in addition to my normal responsibilities.
When I grow ___________, I want to be an astronaut.
I can't believe you're going ___________ to school after all these years.
Enthusiasm for this project has really given __________ after all the delays.
You better leave now if you don't want rush hour traffic to hold you _________.
Turns ___________ I never lost the ticket—it was in my pocket the whole time!
You need to dress _____________ for this event tonight—a suit and tie would be appropriate.
Her singing career had just begun to take ______________.
Who came ___________ with the idea for this marketing campaign?
The hospital is carrying __________ tests to find out what's wrong with her.
He’s never made an effort to keep _____________ current events.
They called the police as soon as they heard someone break ___________ their house.
I'm sorry for all the interruptions—please, carry ___________ with your story.
Can you believe he set the charity ___________ when he was just 15?
Hold that project ___________ until I'm able to get some questions answered by the boss.
It was customary then for children to stand __________ when the teacher came into the classroom.
Children who talk ____________ are regarded as disrespectful.
I think I put my pants ____________ backward!
GMT stands ____________ Greenwich Mean Time.
The neighbors are out looking ____________ their dog yet again.
Management is looking _________ ways of cutting costs.
Many of those old buildings will soon be pulled ____________.
We knew it was time to leave the club when a fight broke _________ between guys at the bar.
You'd better pass _________ his rude remarks in silence.
This new car runs __________ electricity. It is the latest product.
Her fans will be waiting for her when she gets __________ the plane.
She said she didn't sleep well last night and went upstairs to lie ___________.
I don't want to upset my mom during the holidays, so I am acting _________ the part of dutiful daughter.
House prices in our neighborhood have gone ___________ significantly, so we're thinking of selling.
The black lettering really stands __________ on that orange background.
I'm eager to get out of the city and take __________ some mountain air!
I've got to go - something has just come ___________ at home and I'm needed there.
We need to hire a nurse to care ____________ grandpa when he gets out of the hospital.
I think she came __________ all of that money when her grandmother died.
I called _________ to my best friend when I saw her walking down the street, but she had headphones on and couldn't hear me.
The planets move ___________ the sun in ellipses.
If you'll just hold ____________ a minute, I'll pull up your file.
She spread the blanket __________ the sleeping child.
The levee is holding __________ the floodwaters, for now.
The amount of people going to the cinema accounts ___________ 30%.
The meeting has been put ___________ for a week.
Half the town washed ______________ during the floods.
The doctor has told him to slow ___________ or he'll have a heart attack.
The moment I met my wife, I fell _________ her completely.
He came ____________ me in the club and asked if I would like to dance.
The thieves busted the ATM and made _____________ the cash inside.
Would you mind turning ___________ your radio? It's very distracting.
I'm so sad to hear that Mara and John broke ____________—I thought those two would be together forever.
I had to read the letter twice before I could take it all _________.
We sat pondering ___________ various ways to improve our business model when Janet suddenly came up with a brilliant idea.
I was supposed to go out tonight, but Marisa is sick and called __________ our dinner.
Mobile phones have largely taken ___________ home phones for most people in recent years.
Let me just grab a pen so I can jot that number ___________.
The flower gave ___________ its heavy perfume at dusk.
You made a commitment to support our project, and now you've gone _____________ your word!
I tried to patch _________ my dispute with Marcy, but she isn't ready to forgive me.
If we speed up, we might be able to catch _______________ the car ahead of us!
Apparently, Gina fell __________ with Dave last week, and now they're not talking to each other at all.
You really need to clean ___________ your room. It's like a pigsty in there!
I need to turn _________ the lights to see properly.
Stocks in the company have gone ____________ for the third straight week in a row.
The bus was so full that it could no longer pick ___________ passengers.
I'm terrible at keeping secrets. My face goes beet red and gives me _________ every time.
I'm going to try __________ this dress to see if it fits, because it's on sale for an incredible price.
I put ___________ a little every month for a deposit on a house.
Make sure the kids wash ____________ before dinner.
She ran __________ in tears after he told her that their relationship was over.
He developed a new system to help speed __________ the work.
My wife has run ___________ with another man.
He dropped ________________ the race after two laps.
Sally is putting me _______________ for the weekend.
I called _________ my dad when I noticed the leak in the dining room ceiling.
It is obvious that dinosaurs died ____________ millions of years ago.
I need some time to mull __________ the options before I pick one.
But everything he had intended to pass ____________ to his 19-year-old daughter.
It's getting dark, so we'd better make __________ camp.
The librarian pointed ___________ the sign that said to keep quiet.
I called __________ the school to find out the status of my application.
One bad harvest could wipe _________ all of a grower's profits for the previous two years.
Those boys are going to have to come ____________ a punishment after starting the food fight.
I've been putting $50 aside every month in an attempt to build _________ my savings.
Parents should start early to put something _____________ their children - for college.
I’m not very good at golf – I only took it ______________ recently.
I always look ____________ for deals when I'm shopping.
Lots of people have given ___________ smoking, so I'm confident that you can too.
Weak men wait _________ opportunity, but the strong men make it.
Run! The bomb in the building could go ____________ at any moment!
I've got to go - something has just come _____________ at home and I'm needed there.
She's terribly upset because her father passed __________ last week.
The whole point of test driving a car is to try it __________ and see if you feel comfortable in it.
The store ran _____________ bottled water and canned food after the government issued the hurricane warning.
We need to go ____________ every inch of this house to find my engagement ring!
After Lily fainted, we used smelling salts to get her to come _____________.
I'll pray ___________ a peaceful resolution to this conflict.
He was ill for six weeks and fell _________ with his schoolwork.
The clouds finally parted and the sun came ____________.
It was decided that I would stand ______________ my sister at the head of the company while she took her sabbatical.
We put _________ some new pictures in the living room.
Drop ____________ whenever you’re in the neighborhood.
Money spent on new facilities isn't just buried in a hole somewhere, it's spent on construction and put ____________ into the economy.
I will award extra credit to anyone who goes _______________ the parameters of the assignment with their research.
He dropped out __________ school a month before graduation.
I can read most of this, but I can't make ___________ the last part. Can you?
Under the threat of a strike, the management gave ___________ and agreed to reinstate annual pay increases for all employees.
I'm interested _____ learning new languages.
He's always been good _____ math.
She's afraid _____ snakes.
I'm allergic _____ pollen.
He's angry _____ his brother.
They're tired _____ walking all day.
He's proud _____ his achievements.
She's famous _____ her acting skills.
I'm similar _____ my brother in many ways.
They're excited _____ the upcoming trip.
She's curious _____ other cultures.
The cat is hiding _____ the sofa.
The book is lying _____ the table.
I'm sitting _____ the chair.
The dog is barking _____ the mailman.
I'm going _____ the park.
I'm looking _____ a new job.
I'm looking forward _____ the weekend.
I'm looking _____ my younger brother while my parents are away.
Please pass the book _______ me.
She arrived _______ the airport this morning.
The cat jumped _______ the table.
The party will take place _______ 6 PM _______ 10 PM.
He walked _______ the street and entered the building.
The birds flew _______ the trees and landed on the roof.
The ball rolled _______ the hill and into the river.
We went swimming _______ the hot summer day.
The picture hangs _______ the wall in the living room.
The car pulled _______ the gas station for a quick refill.
She hid the key _______ the flowerpot for safekeeping.
The plane flew _______ the clouds and into the clear sky.
The hiking trail leads _______ the forest and up the mountain.
He carefully placed the vase _______ the shelf to display it.
The train traveled _______ the tunnel and arrived at the station.
They sat _______ the fire and shared stories.
The river flows _______ the valley and into the sea.
The cat climbed _______ the tree to chase after a bird.
The path winds _______ the garden and through the woods.
The teacher wrote the notes _______ the whiteboard for everyone to see.
The pen is on top ______ the table.
She hid the treasure _____ the small box.
The dog ran ______ the shade of the tree.
They gathered _____ the campfire.
The train passed by the bridge ____ the river.
She put the flowers ____ the side of the vase.
They walked ____ the shore of the beach.
The bird flew ___ the roof of the house.
The squirrel ran _____ the trunk of the tree.
The kids played _____ the two trees.
He stood ____ the tall building.
The bookshelf is _____ the wall.
The ball rolled _____ the slope of the hill.
The painting hangs ____ the fireplace.
He walked towards the end ______ the road.
The book is next ______ the lamp.
The cat jumped ______ the edge of the bed.
They sat in front ______ the big tree.
The car drove _____ the dark tunnel.
The ball rolled _____ the green field.
The pen is resting ____ the surface of the wooden desk
He walked _____ the end of the long and winding road.
The book is positioned _____ the antique desk lamp.
The cat effortlessly leapt _____ the edge of the cozy bed
They sat _____ the shade of the towering oak tree.
The car swiftly navigated _____ the dimly lit tunnel.
The ball rolled across the vast expanse _____ the lush green field.
She concealed the precious treasure _____ the intricately designed jewelry box.
The dog playfully frolicked beneath the sprawling branches ____ the old willow tree, chasing its tail.
They gathered _______ the crackling campfire, sharing stories and laughter into the late hours of the night.
The train rumbled by the sturdy iron bridge, suspended high _____ the gushing river below.
She carefully placed the flowers _________ the curved side of the delicate porcelain vase, enhancing its beauty.
They strolled leisurely _____ the golden sandy shore of the tranquil beach, feeling the warmth of the sun on their skin.
The bird soared high above the slanted rooftops, its wings spanning ______ the limitless sky.
The squirrel skillfully scampered _____ the rough bark of the towering oak tree, searching for acorns.
The kids joyfully played _____ the two massive boulders, creating an imaginary world of adventure.
He stood _____ the towering glass façade of the modern skyscraper, observing the bustling city below.
The bookshelf is snugly nestled _____ the dimly lit wall, displaying an array of treasured literary works.
The ball eagerly rolled ____ the steep slope of the emerald-green hill, propelled by gravity's force.
The painting hangs gracefully _____ the majestic marble fireplace, adding a touch of elegance to the room.
The key ___ success lies within hard work and determination.
She was very surprised________ the grade she received.
We might need more food, depending____ how many people turn up.
Jane doesn't spend much money______ clothes.
She always takes good care_______ her children.
A sign warned motorists______ dangers.
They translated the letter ______ French.
I was disappointed________ the grade I received on my last essay.
The medical center is close ________ campus.
We went there_______ car and stayed there for the whole day.
We started our journey ______ foot.
He always prevents me_______ doing my duty.
I write letters _______ my right hand.
The war victims suffered terribly______ cold and hunger.
She is absent_______ class
It is very nice______ you to take so much trouble.
You may write________ pencil.
He congratulated me_______ winning the competition.
Remember me________ your parents.
Mr. Foster lives_____ 667E 76th street______ New York.
We reached______ her house safe and sound.
He insisted______ taking us dinner.
Do you believe_______ ghosts?
Ed depends________ his family for financial support.
Ann looked______ the mirror and admired her new blouse.
The new manager's name is familiar_____ most of us.
Those books deal mainly_______ tropical plants.
_______ the game last evening, my cousin hurt his ankle.
Water consists_____ oxygen and hydrogen.
There is an increasing demand_____ taller building in big cities.
Is the United States the wealthiest country______ the world?
When ______ Rome do as the Romans do.
This must be done_________ any price.
Your request_______ a scholarship has been taken into account.
He succeeded________ getting a scholarship.
Mark Twain based the story______his experience in the West.
We just rested_________ short time.
Don't put____ until tomorrow what you can do today.
John Harcourt was ashamed_______ his father.
I prefer coffee______ tea.
If you don't know the meaning of the word, look it__ in the dictionary.
